tooltip.extras.label: Extras
tooltip.expander.power3: RF capacity to a turret base.
tooltip.expander.inv2: Adds 9 slots of inventory that the turret base can use.
tooltip.expander.inv3: Each slot can only accept a max stack size of
tooltip.openmodularturrets.memory_card.d: RightClick base copies data from card
tooltip.omtteam.openmodularturrets:targe: If the base's turrets target mobs.
If the base's turrets target passive creatures.
If the base's turrets target (non-trusted) players.
tooltip.omtteam.openmodularturrets:minus: Decrease the max range for the turret(s)
tooltip.omtteam.openmodularturrets:plus_: Increase the max range for the turret(s)
tooltip.omtteam.openmodularturrets:multi: Change if turrets should focus fire or spread it.
tooltip.omtteam.openmodularturrets:ammo_: Ammo and Fuel for the modular turret.
tooltip.omtteam.openmodularturrets:addon: Addons (for more functions) for the modular turret.
tooltip.omtteam.openmodularturrets:base_: Max range for turrets, in blocks.
flavour.expander.power.4: Can be used as a sinking device.
flavour.expander.inv.1: A little goes a long way.
flavour.expander.inv.4: Can be used as a floatation device.
flavour.turret.9a: It's like long strands of spaghetti,
turret.addon.label: Turret Addon
turret.addon.amp.a.label: Adds a few % of maxHP of target
turret.addon.amp.b.label: (dep. on turret) as damage per projectile.
turret.addon.potentia.c: Adds an internal Potentia capacity of
turret.addon.potentia.d: Adding Ordo vis through a network
turret.addon.potentia.flavour: Because Eskom can't get it right...
turret.addon.recycler.1: Adds a chance for a turret to not use ammo,
turret.addon.recycler.2: as well as a chance to generate ammo, per shot.
turret.addon.concealer.1: Conceals turrets when they aren't shooting.
turret.addon.fakedrops.b: drop loot as if a player killed them.
turret.upgrade.label: Turret Upgrade
turret.upgrade.turretinfo: For effects see tooltips of turrets.
turret.upgrade.range.flavour: Will you pass me the fork?
turret.upgrade.eff: RF use per shot, per upgrade.
turret.upgrade.scatter.a: Adds 2 projectiles to each shot, at the cost of
turret.upgrade.scatter.b: +2 ammo usage, decr. accuracy and increased RF usage.
turret.upgrade.scatter.flavour: You just need to shoot more bullets.
turret.ammo.label: Turret Ammunition
turret.ammo.blazing_clay: Blazing clay for the Incendiary Turret
turret.ammo.bullet: A simple bullet for use with the machine gun turret.
turret.ammo.ferro_slug: This advanced looking slug is for the railgun.
turret.ammo.grenade: Nice grenade for the grenade launcher.
turret.ammo.rocket: Rockets are being used by the rocket launcher, obviously!
status.ownership: You do not own this turret, or you don't have permission to do that.
status.warning: You are entering a turret-protected area. Continue at your own risk.
death.attack.blazingclay: %s got cooked to a juicy medium-rare.
death.attack.rocket: %s found that rainbow connection in the form of a rocket.
